overview: An enchanting fashion film by Wim Winders follows the story of young love blossoming on the sets of a sci-fi drama, invigoratingly costumed in the futuristic #FerragamoAW21 collection. A stylish film director, Gaia Girace finds her professional focus getting distractingly entwined with the start of something new, when she bumps into her laconically handsome sound engineer Felix Sandman.
title: A Future Together
